Title: S6 Ep. 247 - Diante Lawrence - Storytelling That Creates Possibility
Description:
Wondering about the world of writing children’s books and the impact that has on generations to come? Diante Lawrence is this week’s Intern Whisperer guest and is a powerhouse of purpose and intentionality. Tune in to hear how he got started in the real estate business, migrated to becoming a children’s book author, and has future plans to turn the stories into TV series and merchandise. This entrepreneur will inspire you to look at negatives as positives that leaves you smiling and looking at life differently.
